name: Tile Typer
description: Tile Typer is a simple score chasing game. Bind your keys then press them as they come up. Can you beat your previous speeds? How long can you be accurate?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and later Processor: Any Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 4 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and later Processor: Any Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 4 MB available space Sound Card: Any
